abstract: NHL Roundup; Montreal Canadiens beat Nashville Predators, 2-1; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Montreal goaltender Carey Price, who had missed two games with an upper-body injury, made 37 saves.
snippet: Montreal goaltender Carey Price, who had missed two games with an upper-body injury, made 37 saves.

headline.main: Canadiens Knock Off Predators as Price Returns to the Net
headline.print_headline: Canadiens Knock Off Predators as Price Returns to the Net
